Mod.name: Tales of Kupoli (Yet another things mod)
Mod.description:
Hello Mina.
A bunch of things, because you need all the things.
[b]Features[/b] [list] [*] 23 new spells [*] 19 new wands and weapons [*] 2 new perks [*] Create 2 new Suns [*] Harvest the souls from enemies to fuel your spells [*] Special wands, spells, and other items drop from enemies [*] Revive bosses [*] Things!!! [*] Tales (of Kupoli) [/list]
[i] ~ROSETTA 0~
Dearest Ikkuna, We found the *s$@8} you sent. As expected it was around the desert altar. If it works, these Rosettas should reach you on the otherside. We hope you can find %{!#0a^3 under one of your shrines. Its the one guarded by the octopus I believe. The Hermits have made great advancements in their shard-powered robotics program so I fear I don't have much time left. Oh, and we have managed to track that ruby thief to the Soul Tree. I've dispatched a party down to it so hopefully we should be able to make that 3/9 shards found. Anyways I should get going now. Glass to find and all. I love you. Goodbye. -V [/i]
if you have questions please contact my thermodynamic lawyer at https://discord.gg/FKaRA9HMUq thanks
